definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: This congressman is clever at making scores off hecklers at public meetings.
sentences.chinese: 这位国会议员擅长在公众集会上驳倒诘难者。

sentences.english: The atmosphere in the early hours of Tuesday's anti-government rally was friendly.
sentences.chinese: 在周二的反政府集会凌晨气氛友好。

sentences.english: The political rally was souped up by the appearance of the candidates.
sentences.chinese: 这次政治集会由于各候选人的出席而显得更为热闹。

sentences.english: They were fighting for freedom of speech and freedom of assembly.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为言论自由和集会自由而斗争。

sentences.english: I hear there is a (kegger) [beer party] at John's house tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我传闻今晚在约翰家里有一个啤酒集会。

sentences.english: Villagers are gathering at the entrance of the village to celebrate this year's grain harvest.
sentences.chinese: 村民们在村头集会，庆贺今年的粮食丰收。

sentences.english: At least one-thousand protesters rallied for the final day of the convention.
sentences.chinese: 在大会的最后一天，至少有一千名抗议者举行集会。

sentences.english: Police then rushed to the scene to sort out the horse and Luo Tuoqing meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 警方随后赶赴现场将马和骆驼清理出集会场所。

sentences.english: The arrival of the players from friendly countries juiced up the gathering.
sentences.chinese: 友好国家运动员们的到来，使集会的气氛活跃起来了。

sentences.english: This hall may is hired for weddings and other functions.
sentences.chinese: 这个大厅可租来举行婚礼或其他集会。

sentences.english: This group is already a congregation of a Russian church during a ritual ice-cold water bathing.
sentences.chinese: 这是在冰水浴仪式中，一座俄罗斯教堂里的会众集会。

sentences.english: En route to the university , we saw a tail-gate party near the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 去大学的途中，我们看到在体育馆边有个车后集会。

sentences.english: They took the governor's toupee at the rally.
sentences.chinese: 有人在集会上抢走了州长的假发。

sentences.english: Political parties and voters have no freedom of speech, assembly and association in society.
sentences.chinese: 各政党和选民没有言论集会和结社自由。

sentences.english: Any kind of assembly was suppressed in this country.
sentences.chinese: 该国过去禁止一切形式的集会。

sentences.english: Candidates have continued to hold rallies and broadcast radio ads.
sentences.chinese: 候选人还得继续集会游行和广播广告。

definition: to demonstrate (as a protest)/a demonstration/a military show of force
